They have great spiritual powers and are endowed with great compassion.
Why is it that we now see sentient beings
Falling into the hells, hungry ghosts, and animals,
And in the human and heavenly realms experiencing various intense sufferings.
They do not employ skillful means to rescue and deliver them.
We only pray that you will have compassion and enable them to escape from suffering and difficulties.

We only pray that you will have compassion for all sentient beings
And reveal the skillful method of rescuing from suffering and difficulties.
At that time, the World-Honored One told the two great beings and their retinue:
You should take your seats.
I now have compassion for all sentient beings
And will briefly explain the skillful method of rescuing from suffering and difficulties.
You should listen attentively and contemplate well. There is a great dhÄraá¹‡Ä« called the Victorious Banner Arm Seal.
If one always recites it, it can destroy the sins of the five heinous crimes and the ten evil deeds.
Will never again experience rebirth in the evil destinies.
And the extreme suffering of humans and gods.
Those who always uphold it will attain wealth and status in the present life.
In the future, they will be born into a noble family.
Whatever they desire will manifest, and they will experience all kinds of happiness.
They will always encounter the buddhas and attain the recollection of past lives.
Up to unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

svÄhÄ, good man, this is the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« of the seal of the victorious banner arm.
It was spoken by the buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.
I now have compassion for all sentient beings.
Because of your request, I will also speak for the assembly.
Good man, it is very difficult to encounter the appearance of a buddha in the world.
It is even more difficult to obtain a human body.
It is even more difficult to hear this divine mantra.
If there are good men and good women
who are able to uphold it correctly, it is still difficult to obtain.ğŸ”½How much more so for those who write it out, diligently recite it,
and encourage others to uphold it?
Good man, I remember in the past
I was at the places of the buddhas such as the Medicine Master, Lapis Lazuli Light, and Supreme Contemplation, and so forth.
Hearing this divine mantra, upholding and reciting it, and correctly explaining it to others,
By this, one will attain supreme enlightenment.
Therefore, you should diligently study and practice it.
Encourage all sentient beings to uphold and recite it.
Liberate them from suffering and difficulties, and attain victorious and blissful benefits.
